name: Car Driver (Elijah Nutter)
description:
Try to avoid all the cars and make it to the end! And remember, stay off the grass!

Credits:

Music: https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UC-HCfO9d0bHjDtKC-lWIRVg/music

Sounds Created With: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Cars: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/arcade-free-racing-car-16...

Roads: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/low-poly-road-pac...

Road Blockers: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/road-blocker-663
